passive.name: FEY FEATHERS
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) FEY FEATHERS
                                Every 40s (-1,8s ), gains a 31 health shield (31 (+16 ) + 80% ). Attacks and abilities on enemy champions reduce this cooldown by 1s.Lover's Leap: Xayah and Rakan can join each other's recall. Both will reach the Summoning Platform at the time of which the initiator's recall ends.

q.name: (Q) GLEAMING QUILL
q.description:
(Q) GLEAMING QUILL
 10/9/8/7s   60 
                                
                                
                                Flings a magical feather that deals 80 magic damage (80/140/200/260 + 60% ) to the first enemy hit.If the feather hits a champion or epic monster, Rakan restores 36 health (30 + 6 + 70% ) to himself and nearby allies after 3s or when he touches an ally.Range: 800

w.name: (W) GRAND ENTRANCE
w.description:
(W) GRAND ENTRANCE
 16/14/12/10s   50/60/70/80 
                                
                                
                                Dashes to a location. Upon arrival Rakan leaps into the air, dealing 70 magic damage (70/135/200/265 + 55% ) and knocking up enemies for 1s.

e.name: (E) BATTLE DANCE
e.description:
(E) BATTLE DANCE
 18/16/14/12s   60/70/80/90 
                                
                                
                                Flies to an allied champion, granting them a shield that absorbs 50 damage (50/80/110/140 + 65% ) for 3s. When cast on Xayah, the shield amount is increased by 125% and the cooldown is reduced.Can be re-cast for free within 5s.

r.name: (R) THE QUICKNESS
r.description:
(R) THE QUICKNESS
 80/70/60s   100 
                                
                                
                                Gains 60% Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Touching enemies deals 100 magic damage (100/200/300 + 50% ) and charms them for 1/1.25/1.5s. This may only occur once per unit. The first champion charmed grants Rakan 75% decaying Movement Speed.

starting_items_detailed.passive: Spoils of War: Melee basic attacks execute minions below 50% health. Killing a minion heals the nearest allied champion for 50 health and grants them kill gold. 3 charges; recharges every 35 seconds.
starting_items_detailed.description: Starting support item for tanky supports. Provides sustain and gold generation for both you and your ADC.

boots_detailed.passive: Reduces duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, and immobilizes by 30%
boots_detailed.description: Magic resistance boots that also provide tenacity, reducing the duration of crowd control effects. Essential against heavy AP or CC compositions.

situational_items_detailed.passive: Spoils of War: Melee basic attacks execute minions below 50% health. Killing a minion heals the nearest allied champion for 50 health and grants them kill gold.
situational_items_detailed.active: Ward: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 150 seconds (4 charges, refills upon visiting shop)
situational_items_detailed.description: Upgraded support item that provides health, sustain, and vision control. Essential for tanky supports.

situational_items_detailed.passive: Reduces duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, and immobilizes by 30%
situational_items_detailed.description: Magic resistance boots that also provide tenacity, reducing the duration of crowd control effects. Essential against heavy AP or CC compositions.

example_build_detailed.passive: Spoils of War: Melee basic attacks execute minions below 50% health. Killing a minion heals the nearest allied champion for 50 health and grants them kill gold.
example_build_detailed.active: Ward: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 150 seconds (4 charges, refills upon visiting shop)
example_build_detailed.description: Upgraded support item that provides health, sustain, and vision control. Essential for tanky supports.

example_build_detailed.active: Conduit: Bind to an ally. When you cast your ultimate, you and your ally gain 20% attack speed for 8 seconds
example_build_detailed.description: Support item that provides defensive stats and a powerful active that enhances both you and your ADC. Great for engaging supports who want to boost their carry's damage.
